comment: Good teacher and class can be an easy A. You have to give a mock interview in front of the class as one of his assignment, but its a small class size. For those who don't like talking in front of crowds, you will have to give speeches and reports in some of your other classes eventually so this is a good time to warm up to the idea of it.

Interesting man, good at what he does and he does a good job making it interesting. One tip, he will assign random groups for a volunteer project, get along with your group and make sure everyone's willing to give 100%. I had all my group members bail on me and i ended up with a B in this class because of it.
Great, you can tell he loves what he does.

I took his class (PSYC 3335)in the summer. He is VERY thorough and clear. His exams are m/c and are super easy! If you pay attention you don't need the book. He is really nice,knowledgeable and helpful. Did I mention he is smoking hot! Seriously, he  is a great teacher and I highly recommend any course he teaches.  I got and A in this class.

I LOVE HIM.. he has an accent and he talks really slow. he is hilarious and he is super easy to get in touch with. He gets to know each student and though the class is pretty lame.. he is such a great guy. I recommend taking this class as a co-requisite with psychology. I got an A. but you do need to try, Work hard and he will really like you

This class was basically useless. However, if you must take it I would recommend Dr. Dyer. He is young and tries to make the material interesting. Make sure to study the slides and read the common reader and STUDY for your final. Much harder than the rest of the tests.

Dyer is awesome. He's a very relaxed, laid back professor. You have 4 exams, the last one being your final (which is not cumulative). A few group projects, and he likes to use big words... he's kinda corny. He is very helpful however, and I highly recommend his class!

Pretty relaxed class. He's kinda goofy. Tests aren't super easy but if you read and study for an hour your good. A few group projects. Overall pretty easy class if you dont miss too many days. And he most always lets you out early! :)

Nice and friendly professor. Lectures are pretty boring. Tests are not easy but not hard. Likes participation from the class. Group project due at end of semester. Hardly ever stay the full time. I would recommend him.
I agree with just about everyone else. Really great professor, but his tests are not easy. Not an esay A class, but would take him another class,especially psch.

Tests are oddly written, and pretty difficult. The reading material (Soul of a Citizen) is SO BORING. I couldn't even make myself read it. But, there aren't many questions about it on the test. The questions are based off of what he says in class, not what is in the book, so MAKE SURE YOU ATTEND CLASS and study the book when he gives study guides!
Test are crazily written but overall the class is enjoyable and easy.

Good teacher. Tests are hard and are written like psychology tests and really make you think. Class is mandatory you miss 3 days and the best you can make is a B. Overall great teacher and easy to understand. He does have corny jokes though

Professor Dyer was a very down-to-earth professor. His tests are a little bit difficult, but with the grading curve, you always do well. And might I add that he is dead sexy. I never wanted to miss a class of gazing at him from my seat.

I am surprised by some of the comments. I took notes and read the chapters in the book and felt like all the questions on the test were things I should have known.  You have to study and think, it's not just an easy A but it's not out of left field either.  I think he is nice and I really like his class. He's probably my favorite professor.

he's easy, but his tests are hard with questions that werent covered in the notes. the class is easy (of course) but thats just because of the extra grades in addition to the tests. hes a really nice guy and i really like him, its just the tests that suck. i'd take him again if i had the chance tho.

Professor is really cool & he was extremely available for help & tries to make the class as interesting as possible. Do NOT think that KSU 1101 is an "easy A" I really really had to work for mine! It's harder than you think. HUGE ON ATTENDANCE & MUST READ THE MATERIAL! Tests are not too hard if you as long as you do those!

He is a cool guy and there are only 5 tests throughout the semester which are the only grades besides some extra credit. He has some very interesting stories about psychology and is very passionate about the subject. He makes it very interesting and enjotable. I recommend him highly.

this professor was ridiculous... extremely hard tests and stressed attendance, which i attended all but 1 class due to divorce hearing and he allowed so many people to be late and talk back to him... he doesn't need to teach this class. He is a psychologist not a standard teacher. Don't take his class

Great professor. He's crystal clear, and makes the lectures as interesting as possible. He's in his element by the time the mental health chapter rolls around. Just go to class, listen, take good notes, and you'll be fine.

He's different..but really nice. very helpful and responds to emails quickly. its a boring class but its mandatory so he's a good teacher to have for it. Watch out for tests though becuase he adds alot of questions that we never discussed in class...

Professor Dyer is a great guy. If all teachers taught using the humorous and informative style he uses, I think everyone would have all A's. Not to say your guaranteed an A in his class; Make sure you take good notes and always come to class; Do that and you'll do fine.
Awesome teacher. Is clear about that he wants and never hesitates to clarify anything. Got an easy A+. Just do the work he asks and your set.

The worst yet one of the easiest teachers i have ever had. Most of his test you will ask yourself when did we learn this. Half the time he doesn't even teach he expects you to just teach it to yourself. Projects are overall pretty easy. If whole class does bad on test,which always happens he does a major grade curve! Can easily get an A.

Take notes on anything he says will chastize yo to no end if you dont rember exactly what he says. if you speak up the first week expect to be called on at least once a class for the rest of the semester.
Overall: A great teacher. He is clear about what he wants and has an interesting personality. He seems extremely rational, and easy to cooperate and get along with.
